paleval 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Get separation within discrete-palette

Source: R/separation.R
pev_data_separation.Rd

Get separation within discrete-palette

pev_data_separation(.fdisc, method = "cie2000", include_cvd = TRUE)

Arguments

.fdisc

object that can be coerced to pev_fdisc, when called with an integer, returns the corresponding (hex-code) values.
method

character method to use for comparison, passed to farver::compare_color(). One of: "euclidean", "cie1976", "cie94", "cie2000", or "cmc".
include_cvd

logical, indicates to include data for for color-vision deficiency

Value

tbl_df with variables cvd, hex_a, hex_b, distance

See also

pev_gg_separation

Examples

  fcont <- pev_fcont("Dynamic")
  fdisc <- pev_fdisc(fcont, n = 7, method = "panel")
  pev_data_separation(fdisc)
#> # A tibble: 196 x 5
